Key Match Events: South Africa beat England by seven runs
Rabada bowled a tight over at just the right time
Markram caught Brook to effectively seal the game for South Africa
Pre-Game Insights: Markram: ‘We are on the right track’
Buttler credits de Kock as the game changer
Post-Match Reflections: De Kock wins Man of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was a completely different surface compared to the night games
The game swung on Markram’s catch of Brook
South Africa’s fielding was superb and helped rack up the pressure on England
Others: One run and England lost the match
Curran works it to deep mid-wicket but declines the run
